1010170.name: Discord Bot - Controls
1010170.description:
Note:

This software is no longer maintained! While the main functionality still works, some features may be broken.

Make your own Discord bot today with Discord Bot - Controls. Use our easy and modern interface to design your own Discord bot.

Features

  • Easy configurations: Make a Discord bot easy and fast with a simple control panel.
  • Add chat commands: You can always add new commands in few seconds.
  • Pre-installed plugins: You don't have to download plugins. All released plugins are always included in the software.
  • Export to Windows and Ubuntu: Export your bot, change the code and have fun.
